contribution_desc:
Small building blocks whereas each block consists sensing technology to detect nearby blocks, a screen for visual output, and wireless communication.
The paper also describes initial work on an interaction language for SNUI (sensor network user interfaces)
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Identity; Positioning left/right/top/bottom; Relative location; Orientation (3-axis accelerometer); Orientation; Positioning left/right; Positioning top/bottom
tracking_tech: IrDA transceivers; IMU; 3-axis accelerometer; RF radio
network_infrastructure: RF radio, otherwise not further specified
